participant_1.background:
I have a dog named Petrucci who always knows how to cheer me up when my inner critic is being too harsh.
i am a mother of two beautiful boys.
i only eat organic food.
I spend my days trying to learn more about the gambling business.
i still dream about going to paris and designing clothes.

participant_2.background:
My comic book collection was stolen from my apartment when I was away on vacation.
i own a pug , and he is the most loyal pet you will ever have.
i have high speed internet.
i enjoy doing beadwork and writing my own patterns.
i drive only toyota.

content.text: Hi!  How's it going today?
Hey there!  It's going well, thanks for asking.  How about you?
It's a good day!  So, what kind of things do you like to do in your free time?
I like to do beadwork and write my own patterns.  I also like to spend time with my pug.
That's cool!  I've always wanted to try my hand at beadwork.  What kind of things do you make?
I've made a lot of different things, but I like to make jewelry the most.  I also like to make keychains and ornaments.
Those sound really cool!  Do you have any pictures of your work that you can share?
Yeah, I can send you some pictures later.  I'm actually working on a new project right now.
That's awesome!  I'd love to see the finished product.
Sure thing!  I'll send you a picture when it's done.
Great!  Thanks!
No problem!  So, what do you like to do in your free time?
I like to spend time with my family and friends.  I also like to go out and explore new places.  I'm also a big fan of gambling.
Gambling?  That's interesting.  What kind of gambling do you like to do?
I mostly play poker and blackjack.  I also like to bet on sports.
That sounds like fun!  I've never really been into gambling, but it sounds like something I could get into.
It's definitely a lot of fun!  And it can be a good way to make some money.
That's what I've heard!  I might have to give it a try sometime.
I'd definitely recommend it!
Thanks for the recommendation
